ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:55:37 [Issue ID 4000-103789] urn:comicvine:4000-103789 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 23:06:01. [Issue ID 230409]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The saga continues as Alley has to come to terms with the death of her fiance and the symbiotic relationship she has with the leather suit crafted and possessed by the Marquis de Sade. An unusual balance of her innocence and the evil of the leather suit acts as a beacon to the supernatural world-- wreaking havoc on New Orleans as creatures from beyond the pale start arriving en masse. What is the connection between the Marquis de Sade and Alley Cat? Why was she led to the suit? What is the connection to a Satanist cult? Find out in the first chapter in the ongoing saga of Alley Cat!
*Notes:* Albert Deschesne last name was spelled as Dechesne. "Part 1 the Martyr" written by Bob Napton and Matt Hawkins, penciled by Bosco, inked by Tie, colors/design & production by Brett Evans and lettered by Comicraft's Albert Dechesne. "Iron Wings Special Preview" written and penciled by Jay Juch, inked by Mostafa Moussa, colored by Tom Chu and special thanks to Matt Hawkins, Glenn Urieta, Kevin Estrada, Edwin Rosell and Brett Evans. A five page special sneak peek at the upcoming Iron Wings comic. "The Magdalena" two page text piece with questions and answers on the upcoming Magdalena series. "Gary Frank" two page text piece with questions and answers from Gary Frank.
ComicInfo.Title: Part 1 of "the Martyr" / Iron Wings Special Preview
